name: Eligeo CRM Inc.
tagline: A Leading Business Process & Technology Provider
description: Eligeo CRM Inc. is a business process, software and technology consulting company based in Calgary, Alberta, Canada. We assist our customers in the selection, implementation and customization of customer relationship management (CRM) software for a number of different types of industries. We offer a number of project management, management consulting, advisory, implementation, and support services for our customers across North America.
